allPosts.title: Messing around with AI generated art

allPosts.title: Introducing the development team behind Llama RPG!
allPosts.excerpt: Leading the team is MrLlamaSC, who is the creator and man in charge of the project. MrLlamaSC has a passion for video games and has been working on this project for several years.

allPosts.title: Welcome to the development blog for Llama RPG!
allPosts.excerpt: We are excited to share with you the progress and concept art for our upcoming game. Llama RPG is a 2D pixel art style game that features turn-based combat similar to Pokemon and Final Fantasy.
